Kindle Now Available in Australia (and the rest of the world)

This is very exciting. I love to read but paying $20 for shipping and having to wait 3 weeks for a book to arrive from Amazon is crazy. Books are unwieldy and the iPhone makes a decent intermediate device but is far from ideal for reading in long stretches. I’ve really come to enjoy reading anything via Instapaper which bodes well for a device dedicated to reading.

I know the basics but I’d held off reading too much about it because I knew it wasn’t a possibility. Time to dive into some reviews, starting with this one from Matt Haughey.
